title: Gandrel's Aspiration

BG3 Gandrel's Aspiration Information

Feller of Monsters: You have Advantage against Monstrosity type enemies. Sacred Munitions: Infuse your crossbow bolts with holy energy. Your ranged weapon attacks possibly inflict Turn Undead. Range: 18 m

BG3 Gandrel's Aspiration Location & Where to Find

Location: Sunlit Wetlands Dropped by: Gandrel

Gandrel's Aspiration Notes & Tips for BG3
